Key Match Events: Pakistan won the match by 7 wickets against Bangladesh in the 31st match of the 2023 Cricket World Cup.
Fakhar Zaman was the top scorer for Pakistan with 81 runs.
Mahmudullah was the top scorer for Bangladesh with 56 runs.
Pakistan chased down the target in just 32 overs, losing three wickets along the way.
Post-Match Reflections: Pakistan's third win keeps their semi-final hopes alive!
Miscellaneous Highlights: Bangladesh are the first team to be mathematically out of contention for the top four
Others: Shaheen Afridi and Mohammad Wasim and Bangladesh’s Mehidy Hasan were the highest wicket-takers in yesterday’s World Cup match 31 of Bangladesh vs Pakistan.
Bangladesh’s Fakhar Zaman hit the most sixes in yesterday’s match.
